en.name: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds
en.passiveDescription: Increases Movement SPD by 10%. When in battle, gain an {{8//10//12//14//16%}} Elemental DMG Bonus every 4s. Max 4 stacks. Lasts until the character falls or leaves combat.

zh.name: 四风原典
zh.passiveDescription: 移动速度提高10%；在场上每4秒获得{{8//10//12//14//16%}}元素伤害加成。该效果最多叠加4层，持续直到角色倒下或离场。
